message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for us to work together. I'm willing to offer you the product for $90.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not comfortable with the price of $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $95.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $90 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not comfortable with the price of $90. I'm willing to make another concession and offer the product for $92.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair agreement, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $91 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not satisfied with the price of $91. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $93.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $92 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not comfortable with the price of $92. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $94.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $93 for the product.
